cards.title: Breach Mage
setup: Two "Closed Potent Breach" are into play with 3 and 4 tokens in their Focus Pools.
Two "Open Stable Breach" are put into play.
powers: Destroy 2 of your Charge cards. If you do, select a card and activate its [u]Cast[/u] text twice, then destroy that card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Closed Potent Breach
body: When this card has no tokens in its Focus Pool, flip it.
powers: Remove 1 token from this card's Focus Pool.
flippedBody: At the start of your turn, if there is a spell next to this, you may active that Spell's [u]Cast[/u] text, then destroy that spell.
If that [u]Cast[/u] text deals damage, increase that damage by 1.

cards.title: Closed Potent Breach
body: When this card has no tokens in its Focus Pool, flip it.
powers: Remove 1 token from this card's Focus Pool.
flippedBody: At the start of your turn, if there is a spell next to this, you may active that Spell's [u]Cast[/u] text, then destroy that spell.
If that [u]Cast[/u] text deals damage, increase that damage by 1.

cards.title: Closed Stable Breach
body: When this card has no tokens in its Focus Pool, flip it.
cards.powers: Remove 1 token from this card's Focus Pool.
flippedBody: At the start of your turn, if there is a spell next to this, you may active that Spell's [u]Cast[/u] text, then destroy that spell.
flippedPowers: You may play a Spell. You may use an additional power this turn.

flippedPowers: You may play a Spell. You may use an additional power this turn.

cards.title: Focus Breach
body: Select a Closed Breach. Remove 1 token from its Focus Pool.
